description: I was walking down the Badeniho, a beautiful small street in Prague, when I saw two sportsmen. But they seemed to busy or to literally run away from me. So another guy attracted my attention who was sitting on a park bench near the Spanish embassy. He was quite naive and he appeared to be shy. I was able to talk him into a well-paid blow-job. But although I tried my very best - he didn´t agree to do anything more. Too bad. So I went on to a park and there I met a young guy. I wasn´t sure whether he was maybe even gay. He liked to go to theater and was really not talkative. When I seduced him to follow me to a hotel and to give me a blow-job I had to find out that he was a 200% straight.
title: Czech Hunter 100
